en_US.ERROR_RESOURCE_DOESNT_EXIST: This resource could not be found in the resources tool
en_US.ERROR_INVALID_VIDEO_URL: Please enter a valid video URL
en_US.FORM_VISIBILITY: Visibility limited to students of this course

en_US.ERROR_START_DATE_GREATER: The end date must be later than the start date

en_US.ALERT_ERROR: An error has occurred. Please try later.
en_US.ALERT_SUCCESS_SAVE_SYLLABUS: The course outline has been saved.
en_US.ALERT_SUCCESS_ADD_SYLLABUS: The personalized course outline has been added.
en_US.ALERT_SUCCESS_DELETE_SYLLABUS: The course outline has been deleted
en_US.ALERT_NO_PUBLISHED_SYLLABUS: The course outline has not yet been published
en_US.ALERT_NO_LOCK: You don't have the lock on this course outline
en_US.ALERT_LOCKED_BY: The current course outline is locked by %1

en_US.ALERT_IMPORT_SYLLABUS_NOT_FOUND: The specified course outline does not exist
en_US.ALERT_IMPORT_SYLLABUS_ERROR: An error occurred importing the course outline
en_US.ERROR_SYLLABUS: The course outline failed to load. Please try again or contact IT support.
en_US.ERROR_TEMPLATE: An error occurred during the course outline load. Course outline is currently in read-only mode. Please try again or contact IT support.
en_US.MODAL_DESCRIPTION_NEW_SYLLABUS: Add a new personalized course outline ?
en_US.MODAL_SECTIONS_NEW_SYLLABUS: Select the sections for this course outline
en_US.MODAL_SECTIONS_DELETE_SYLLABUS: The following sections have been assigned to this course outline. You have to unassign those sections before deleting the course outline.
en_US.DELETE_SYLLABUS_OK: The following course outline(s) will be deleted
en_US.DELETE_SYLLABUS_KO: The following course outline(s) can't be deleted because there are sections assigned to them
en_US.UNPUBLISH_SYLLABUS_OK: The following course outline(s) will be unpublished
en_US.UNPUBLISH_SYLLABUS_KO: The following course outline(s) can't be unpublished because they are not published
en_US.DATA_MODIFIABLE_IN_RESOURCES: The following data are editable with the Resources tool
en_US.PUBLISH_CHECK_COMMON: The common course outline must be published first before you can publish this course outline.
en_US.PUBLISH_LAST_PUBLISH_LABEL: Last publication of the course outline:
en_US.PUBLISH_MODIFIED_SECTIONS_LABEL: Do you want to publish the course outline modifications for sections
en_US.PUBLISH_ANNOUNCEMENT_INFO: A message will be added to the site announcement tool. You can personalize the message with the fields below.
en_US.ANNOUNCEMENT_TITLE: A new version of the course outline is available
en_US.ANNOUNCEMENT_MESSAGE: A new version of the course outline has been published on
en_US.NO_VALID_SYLLABUS_TO_UNPUBLISH: None of the selected course outlines can be unpublished.
en_US.NO_VALID_SYLLABUS_TO_DELETE: One or more course outlines have been assigned to sections. You need to unassign those sections before deleting the course outline.
en_US.SOME_INVALID_SYLLABUS_TO_DELETE: One or more course outlines have been assigned to sections. You need to unassign those sections before deleting the course outline.
en_US.SYLLABUS_NOT_AVAILABLE: Course outline is not available yet
en_US.WARNING_UNSASSIGN_SECTIONS: Are you sure you want to unassign these sections ?
en_US.BUTTON_IMPORT_SYLLABUS_TOOLTIP: Import a course outline from another site
en_US.BUTTON_MODIFY_PERMISSIONS_TOOLTIP: Modify course outline permissions for instructors
en_US.FORM_IMPORT_INSTRUCTIONS: This tool serves to import a course outline from the former course outline tool (prior to summer 2018). Enter the site id you would like to import the course outline from. All resources in the original course outline will be copied to this site automatically.
en_US.FORM_IMPORT_WARNING: Caution: the import will replace all existing course outlines in this site.
en_US.FORM_IMPORT_CONFIRM: Are you sure you want to import this course outline? All existing course outlines in this site will be deleted and the common course outline will be replace.
en_US.MISSING_SAKAI_ENTITY_FLAG: This link is pointing to an assignment or a quiz that does not exist
en_US.MISSING_SAKAI_RESOURCE_FLAG: This link is pointing to a resource that does not exist
en_US.MISSING_SAKAI_CITATION_FLAG: This link is pointing to a citation that does not exist
en_US.TITLE: Title
en_US.WARNING_UNSAVED: You have unsaved changes that will be lost if you leave this page, would you like to continue?
en_US.MANAGEMENT_EXPLANATION_1: Personalised course outlines are linked to the common course outline. It is not possible to detach them.
en_US.MANAGEMENT_EXPLANATION_2: The "sections" column indicates that students in those sections will see the published version of that course outline.

en_US.tenjin.read.personalised: Read personalised course outlines for all sections
